text: Teddy Griffith (born 18 March 1936) is a Barbadian cricketer. He played twenty-five first-class matches for Barbados and Jamaica between 1953 and 1967. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Barbadian cricketers Category:Barbados cricketers Category:Jamaica cricketers Category:People from Saint Michael, Barbados
title: Teddy Griffith
